DOC.brief_summary: Epithelial ovarian cancer ( EOC ) poor prognosis . EOC management require debulking surgery chemotherapy base taxol carboplatine . Initial response often good , often recurrence occur first 18 month . Early recurrence sign chemoresistance palliative treatment . The study predictive clinical biological factor require adapt therapeutic develop new treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Predictive Factors Chemoresistance Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: patient > 18 year age patient histological proven epithelial ovarian cancer patient give consent patient without ovarian cancer
